name: Alien Bubba
description: Alien Bubba is the intergalactic cross of the renowned Bubba Kush and the heady space invader, Alien Kush. This two-fold Kush blend offers mellow sedation with a mental aura most would describe as introspective or meditative. Its bouquet is earthy and floral, and when combusted, Alien Bubba shows off a pungent tea and herbaceous grassiness that is smooth on the exhale. Enjoy this heady heavy-hitter close to the end of the day to maximize its sedative effects.
descriptionPlain: Alien Bubba is the intergalactic cross of the renowned Bubba Kush and the heady space invader, Alien Kush. This two-fold Kush blend offers mellow sedation with a mental aura most would describe as introspective or meditative. Its bouquet is earthy and floral, and when combusted, Alien Bubba shows off a pungent tea and herbaceous grassiness that is smooth on the exhale. Enjoy this heady heavy-hitter close to the end of the day to maximize its sedative effects.

highlightedReviews.text:
I don't know how to review this mind blowing strain. My wife and I tried a 1g full flower, kief, and distillate preroll. We experienced the full spectrum of what one might expect from this blend of Kush.

Relaxing and euphoric high, pain gone, and the music sounds divine! As I write this, I should be experiencing my nightly myoclonic epileptic jerks (violent body spasms caused by seizures). Not tonight. Tonight I have Alien Bubba on my side. Top 10 strain of my life. If I had regular access, this would be a go to strain to combat my epilepsy.
Felt like I was skipping around from present to past.
